means: 乱涂，潦草地写( scrawl的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He scrawled a hasty note to his wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 他给妻子草草写了个便条。

sentence.Network_en: Someone had scrawled "Scum" on his car.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人在他的车上涂写了“人渣”的字样。

sentence.Network_en: I tried to read his directions, scrawled on a piece of paper.
sentence.Network_cn: 我尽量弄明白他草草写在一片纸上的指示。

PerfectNetExp.abs: she scrawled a few words on the postcard ., 她在明信片上草草地写了几个字.
This letter was scrawled on sheet of the familiar green notepaper ., 这封信是潦潦草草写在一张熟悉的淡绿色便笺上的.
she emerges from a bathroom stall to see the accusation " WHORE " scrawled on the mirror .来势汹汹的数字渗透走出阴影，她从浴室看到摊位出现指责“妓女”上镜字迹潦草。
The children scrawled all over the wall ., 小孩子们在整个墙上乱涂乱画.

list.abs: her signature was an illegible scrawl ., 她的签字潦草难辩.
He wrote a hurried scrawl ., 他字迹很潦草.
I at the gift card scrawled in my father ' s handwriting ., 我看着礼品卡上爸爸的手迹.

entry.tran: 潦草地写;马马虎虎地写
entry.def: If you scrawl something, you write it in a careless and untidy way.

example.ex: He scrawled a hasty note to his wife...
example.tran: 他给妻子草草写了个便条。

example.ex: Someone had scrawled 'Scum' on his car.
example.tran: 有人在他的车上涂写了“人渣”的字样。

entry.tran: 潦草的笔迹;不工整的字迹
entry.def: You can refer to writing that looks careless and untidy as a scrawl .

example.ex: The letter was handwritten, in a hasty, barely decipherable scrawl.
example.tran: 这封信是仓促手写而成，潦草得几乎无法辨认。

auth_sentence.content: They all seized lipsticks and scrawled obscenities over every surface.
auth_sentence.res_content: They all seized lipsticks and scrawled obscenities over every surface.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They all seized lipsticks and scrawled obscenities over every surface.

auth_sentence.content: "Welcome Burk," Calagione had scrawled on the folder.
auth_sentence.res_content: "Welcome Burk," Calagione had scrawled on the folder.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Welcome Burk," Calagione had scrawled on the folder.

auth_sentence.content: He had simply scrawled Composed dessert?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He had simply scrawled Composed dessert?
